articles.author: Sarfraz Khan
articles.title: NVIDIA Reportedly Halts Bundling VRAM Chips With GPU Dies For Board Partners - Wccftech
articles.description: As per a report, NVIDIA has stopped bundling its GPU dies with VRAM chips to its AIBs and wants them to source the memory on their own.
articles.content:
It appears that NVIDIA isn't able to receive sufficient memory for its inventory, which is why it reportedly won't supply the memory chips to its board partners.
NVIDIA gets its VRAM chips from supp… [+1911 chars]
